schema.title: AbstractFacilityEvent
schema.description: A significant occurrence in the life of a facility, which often changes its state, or the state of one of its components.

FacilityEventTypeID.description: The facility event type is a picklist. Examples: Propose, Completion, Entry Date etc.

EffectiveDateTime.description: The date and time at which the event becomes effective.

TerminationDateTime.description: The date and time at which the event is no longer in effect.
